issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://servicepipe.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fservicepipe.ru%2F) ### Comment > cookie ``` Username: @rakleed ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/g51025tnuxkc0ww4wss88s08soosk4sq6v48j9yov4.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.17.3.2020 release System version: | `MacOS 15.6.1 (Build 24G90)` Browser: | Chrome Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries
